health.description: The Health category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to health, hospital locations, infectious diseases, restaurants, deaths, and vaccination.

transportation.description: The Transportation category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to transportation, taxis, uberlyft, bikes, parking, buses, road congestion, road repair, ferries, bridges, rideshare and tolls.

economy.description: The Economy category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to the economy, permits, licenses, business locations, and jobs.

finance.description: The Finance category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to finance, government spending, salaries, budgets, revenues, and taxes.

geographical & map.description: The Geographical & Map category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to transporation, politices, finance, business, health, and the environment.

social services.description: The Social Services category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to social services, homelessness, child protective services, rehab, welfare, and 311 data.

environment.description: The Environment category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to the environment, environmental waste, air, energy, climate, and recycling.

politics.description: The Politics category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to politics.

public safety.description: The Public Safety category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to public safety, 911 data, ambulance, emergency, fire, police, prison, evacuation, arrests, and crime.

housing & development.description: The Housing & Development category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to housing, construction, zoning, building info, and land use.

infrastructure.description: The Infrastructure category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to infrastructure, streets, 311 data, parking, and construction.

education.description: The Education category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to education, school locations, school exams, school performance, and after-school programs.

recreation.description: The Recreation category contains data, from across the Open Data Network™ of publishers, related to recreation, parks, art, boating, and libraries.
